imdb.plot outline: World-renowned medium Suzane Northrop, joined by co-host David Millbern, takes her studio audience on a healing journey to 'The Afterlife.' Through her unique abilities Suzane is able to communicate on behalf of those that can no longer speak for themselves, passing on messages from the beyond to eagerly awaiting loved ones in our studio audience. On this 'profound journey of love,' as it's been called, Suzane brings closure to so many unanswered questions and, more importantly, reminds us that the people we love stay with us always. Perhaps, we will all meet again in 'The Afterlife.'
imdb.title: The Afterlife with Suzane Northrop
plot: World-renowned medium Suzane Northrop, joined by co-host David Millbern, takes her studio audience on a healing journey to 'The Afterlife.' Through her unique abilities Suzane is able to communicate on behalf of those that can no longer speak for themselves, passing on messages from the beyond to eagerly awaiting loved ones in our studio audience. On this 'profound journey of love,' as it's been called, Suzane brings closure to so many unanswered questions and, more importantly, reminds us that the people we love stay with us always. Perhaps, we will all meet again in 'The Afterlife.'::Anonymous
